title: NYS Custom Plate 'BURNSBUS' - Police reports, complaints, narratives

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: NYS Custom Plate 'BURNSBUS' - Police reports, complaints, narratives
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

On December 19, 2025, the NYS Plate 'BURNSBUS' (2021 Chevrolet Suburban) drove through Michael Drive, North Tonawanda, NY 14120 and stopped at a neighbor's residence amongst other things.

1.) Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law (PRA/FOIL), Article 6 of the Public Officers Law, I hereby request copies of all records referencing the New York State vanity plate BURNSBUS (exact text: BURNSBUS), including but not limited to incident/offense reports, complaint narratives, officer narratives, witness statements, dispatch logs, internal complaint or investigation files, from January 1, 2021 through the present.

If any portion of a record is exempt and must be redacted, please provide the remainder of the record with redactions clearly marked and identify the legal basis for each redaction. 5. If you deny any portion of this request, please cite the specific statutory basis for the denial and provide appeal instructions.

I've attached a photo of the BURNSBUS (2021 Chevrolet Suburban)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family
